comment: More great memories with great people on my travels across America / <URL>
amr:

(m / memory

comment: Always make time to eat , drink & be merry ! / <URL>
amr:

(m / make-18

      :ARG0 (y / you)

                  :ARG0 y)
            :op2 (d / drink-01
                  :ARG0 y)
            :op3 (m2 / merry
                  :domain y))
      :time (a2 / always))
